content: प्रेत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [प्र-इ-क्त] Departed from this world, dead, deceased; स्वजनाश्रु किलातिसंततं दहति प्रेतमिति प्रचक्षते <ls>R. 8. 86.</ls> --तः {@--1@} The departed spirit, the spirit before obsequial rites are performed. {@--2@} A ghost, evil spirit, <ls>Bg. 17. 4</ls>; <ls>Ms. 12. 71.</ls>
प्रेत, प्रेति, प्रेत्य &c. See under प्रे.
